description: Daniel Schafer and Jing Chen describe the approach Facebook uses to make data fetching simple for developers, even as a project grows to include dozens of developers and the application becomes as complex as Facebook's news feed.
short_description: Daniel Schafer and Jing Chen describe the approach Facebook uses to make data fetching simple for developers, even as a project
title: React.js Conf 2015 - Data fetching for React applications at Facebook
